dict.acceptation: （机构，企业等的）总部；总店；司令部；指挥部；

sent.orig: He said he will be at GM's Detroit headquarters' on a daily basis.
sent.trans: 惠塔克说，他每天都会在通用汽车底特律总部。

sent.orig: The cult has no headquarters in Japan and uses apartments as its offices.
sent.trans: 该邪教在日本没有总部，并使用公寓作为办公室。

sent.orig: When the company moved its headquarters, 1500 people had to be relocated.
sent.trans: 当公司的总部搬家，1500人不得不加以重新安置。

sent.orig: He rushed the despatch through to headquarters.
The firm' s headquarters are in London.
